name: Touch
content: 渴望你的手指在我身上游走
I mean the whole night long
I know I done you wrong
男孩儿 让你的舌头在我身上游走
With nothin' but a fine tooth comb
Yeah I know I'm to blame
I mean the whole night long
I know I done you wrong
宝贝儿 我要给你打电话
With nothin' but a fine tooth comb
没错 我知道 现在已是深夜
Yeah I know I'm to blame
想感受缠绵交融的感觉
男孩儿 我要你躺在我身边
With nothin' but a fine tooth comb
让你的双手在我身上游走
